title: Valles Caldera National Preserve: Getting Around
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Getting Around              Getting Around       A gravel, dirt road leads from the entrances to the Valle Grande Visitor Center and Banco Bonito Contact Station.   Access beyond the Valle Grande Visitor Center is available via several ways.    By hiking, mountain biking, equestrian riding, cross-country skiing, or snowshoeing.  By taking the Headquarters Shuttle offered during our summer season  By personal vehicle (a backcountry vehicle permit is required, seasonal restrictions apply)    Access beyond the Banco Bonito Contact Station is available via several ways.    By hiking, mountain biking, equestrian riding, cross-country skiing, or snowshoeing    Weather can limit what areas can be visited.
